column1: The Floating Log was an inn in the village of Frogmorton
column2: in the Shires Eastfarthing. The Floating Log stood on the East Road that passed through the Shire
column3: about halfway between Hobbiton and the Brandywine Bridge
column4: and so must have been a busy place. In the time of the War of the Ring
column6: Sharkey and his Men took over the Shire
